Translations.Text: My podaruvaly vas (O Kur'yer) velyka peremoha
Tym samym BOH probachaye vashym mynulym hrikham, tak zhe, yak i maybutnye hrikhy, ta perfects Yoho blahoslovennya na vas, ta keruye vamy u pryamomu shlyakhu
Dodatkovo, BOH pidtrymaye vas z unwavering pidtrymka
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto rozmishchuye contentment u serdenʹka viruyuchiv dodatysya bilʹshe viry, krim yikhnʹoyi viry. Do BOHA nalezhytʹ vsim sylam neba ta zemli. BOH Omniscient, Naybilʹsh Mudryy
Vin zvychayno dopustytʹ viryachyy lyudyam ta zhinkam u park z techuchymy potokamy, prychomu vony perebuyutʹ zavzhdy. Vin vidishle yikhni hrikhy. Tse, u vydovyshchi BOHA, velykoho triumfu

Ta Vin bude requite lyudy lytsemira ta zhinky ta idol obozhnyuyuchi lyudy ta zhinky, dlya vony harbored z·hubni dumky pro BOHA. Yikhnye zlo bude backfire proty nykh. Dlya BOHA hnivayetʹsya z nymy, zasudzhuye yikh, ta maye hotovi do nykh Gehenna. Shcho neshchasna dolya
Do BOHA nalezhytʹ vsim sylam u nebi ta zemli. BOH ye Mohutniy, Naybilʹsh Mudryy
My poslaly vam yak svidok, pred'yavnyk harnoyi novyny, ta warner
Shcho vy lyudy mozhutʹ viryty v BOHU ta Yoho kur'yeru, ta Yo povahy, ta zauvazhuyutʹ Yoho, ta glorify Yo, denʹ ta nich
